page.title: 04VISIT TO WORTHY DOWN CAMP
page.content: {Worthy Down}camp is on the grid reference of 044470134 or on the outskirts of Littleton.The camp holds about one thousand civilians and soldiers. All the soldiers are being trained to be{Military Accoutants}. The camp is heavily guarded with Alsatians which they call {War Dogs,} patrolling guards and barricads.Nearly all the men live on the camp.When they first go to the camp they sleep in four man rooms,but when they gain a higher postion they have rooms of their own. The{Adjutant}of Worthy Down lives in one of the houses just outside the camp.He has a wife and a dog.When his wife goes shopping she has to go to Littleton or Winchester,because there is only one shop in the camp which is only a post office .The shop is called the N.A.A.F.I.
